Neuroradiology built for high-stakes decisions

Neuro Experts, PC delivers advanced brain and spine imaging interpretation for legal, clinical, and research needs. Every engagement is led by board-certified neuroradiologists who translate complex imaging into clear, defensible insight.

Complimentary initial consultation available to scope your case and recommend the right service pathway.

Service pathways

Forensic services

  • Forensic neuroradiology for trauma, malpractice, and disputed findings.
  • Forensic neuropsychology for cognitive evaluation aligned with imaging.
  • Forensic neurology for causation analysis, IME, and expert testimony.

Clinical and research services

  • Clinical neuroradiology consulting for second opinions and protocol review.
  • Research and clinical trial consulting for imaging biomarkers and study design.
  • Radiology business consulting for operational strategy and growth planning.

How to choose the right service

  • Need medico-legal support, expert testimony, or causation analysis? Start with Forensic Neuroradiology or Forensic Neurology.
  • Need a second opinion or complex diagnostic interpretation? Explore Clinical Neuroradiology Consulting.
  • Running a study or clinical trial? Connect with Research & Clinical Trial Consulting.
  • Looking to scale operations or optimize workflows? Consider Radiology Business Consulting.

Who we serve

  • Attorneys + legal teams
  • Hospitals + clinics
  • Research institutions
  • Radiology practices

What you can expect

  • Interpretation across CT, MRI, DTI, fMRI, PET, SPECT, MR perfusion, and spectroscopy.
  • Clear reporting and testimony tailored to legal and clinical audiences.
  • Typical 24-48 hour turnaround for time-sensitive matters.
  • Complimentary initial consultation to scope your case.

How engagements work

Intake + scope

Define your goals, timeline, and key questions.

Expert review

Senior specialists perform modality-specific analysis.

Deliverables

Concise findings, visuals, and recommendations.

Ongoing support

Follow-up consults and testimony support as needed.

We offer a complimentary consultation to define the right service pathway for your case.
